Sentencas: With the in-depth research of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC), the advantages of the protonic ceramic fuel cell (PCFC) have been paid more and more attentions.
Titulo: The Air Flow Distributions within a Typical Planar Protonic Ceramic Fuel Cell Stack

Sentencas: In this paper, three-dimensional calculated fluid dynamics model was built to investigate the fluidity within a typical PCFC stack.
Titulo: The Air Flow Distributions within a Typical Planar Protonic Ceramic Fuel Cell Stack

Sentencas: The result shown that for a typical PCFC stack, the air mass flow rate fed to the piled layers would keep decreasing with the increasing cell number index, while the inlet and outlet manifolds had similar cross section areas.
Titulo: The Air Flow Distributions within a Typical Planar Protonic Ceramic Fuel Cell Stack

Sentencas: Extending the length of the membrane electrode assemblies (MEA) would slightly improve the air flow distribution uniformity.
Titulo: The Air Flow Distributions within a Typical Planar Protonic Ceramic Fuel Cell Stack

Sentencas: The air flow and species distributions among the rib channels would be determined by the sites of the entrances and exits of the manifolds.
Titulo: The Air Flow Distributions within a Typical Planar Protonic Ceramic Fuel Cell Stack

Sentencas: and the solid rib configuration over porous cathodes.
Titulo: The Air Flow Distributions within a Typical Planar Protonic Ceramic Fuel Cell Stack

Sentencas: The vapor mole fraction distribution over the dense electrolyte surface had apparently oppositely with the rib channel configuration, because two mole vapors were generated while one mole oxygen is consumed.
Titulo: The Air Flow Distributions within a Typical Planar Protonic Ceramic Fuel Cell Stack

Sentencas: Different from the O-SOFC stack, the vapor removing capacity would be an important factor for evaluating the quality of the cathode side flow path structure.
Titulo: The Air Flow Distributions within a Typical Planar Protonic Ceramic Fuel Cell Stack
